name: Weird Tycoon
description:
Welcome to the roguelike egg farm game! When you quit is over !

Are you ready to manage your own egg farm and become the richest man alive?

  • Will you unlock all farms and animals? 
  • Upgrade farms and car.
  • Buy upgrade points with coins.
  • Unlock permanent bonuses.
  • Use speed boost.
  • Unlock bonuses from eggs temples, and car temple.
  • Catch flying gold egg with coins reward.

Controls :

WSAD or Arrows - to move camera around.

Q / E - Zoom In / Zoom Out

Mouse LB  - to buy and interact.
